oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Ring inscribed "Lt. G.W. Horton, Co. H., 3d Ill Cav."
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Ring inscribed "Lt. G. W. Horton, Co. H. 3d Ill Cav." It likely belonged to Lt. George W. Horton who was promoted to 1st Lt. on May 12, 1862. He likely was with the 3rd Ill. Cav. Regt., USA when it served at the Battles of Franklin and Nashville. The 3rd Ill. Cav., USA served alongside the 7th Tenn. Cav. Regt., USA at Paduach, Ky. in late 1864 which may account for how this ring ended up in West Tennessee.
